```{r}
#Dataset wave 1

#Select the variables of interest 
subset1_w1 <- subset(data2010, select = c("id", 
                                          "wave", 
                                          "age",
                                          "level_educ",
                                          "gender",
                                           "educ_dad",
                                     "educ_mom",
                                     "dad_house",
                                     "mom_house",
                                     "type_school",
                                     "consecutivo"))
#Sample size 22,179

wave1 <- subset1_w1 #Sample size wave1 22.179

```

```{r}
subset1_w2 <- subset(data2013, select = c("id", 
                                          "wave", 
                                          "age",
                                          "level_educ",
                                          "gender",
                                           "educ_dad",
                                     "educ_mom",
                                     "dad_house",
                                     "mom_house",
                                     "type_school",
                                     "consecutivo"))

#Sample size 20,574

#Drop all NA´s from ID variable
subset2_w2 <- subset(subset1_w2, !is.na(id))
```

```{r}
subset1_w3 <- subset(data2016, select = c("id", 
                                          "wave", 
                                          "age",
                                          "level_educ",
                                          "gender",
                                           "educ_dad",
                                     "educ_mom",
                                     "dad_house",
                                     "mom_house",
                                     "type_school",
                                     "consecutivo"))
#Sample size 19,298

subset2_w3 <- subset(subset1_w3, !is.na(id))
#Sample size 14,944
wave3 <- subset2_w3 #Sample size wave3 14,944
```

```{r}
data2010_2016 <- rbind(wave1, wave2, wave3) #Sample size 54,187

#Drop all NA´s from level_educ
subset1 <- subset(data2010_2016, !is.na(level_educ))
#Sample size 19,977

#Subset the data to ages between 5 and 16(compulsory education in Colombia)
subset2 <- subset(subset1, age > 18)
#Sample size 19,213

#Eliminate level 88 cases from variable level_educ

subset3 <- subset(subset2, level_educ != 88)
#Sample size 19,205

#Remove NA´s from educ_dad
subset4 <- subset(subset3, !is.na(educ_dad))

#Remove NA´s from wduc_mom

subset5 <- subset(subset4, !is.na(educ_mom))

data01 <- subset5

```

```{r}
freq_depv <- data01 %>% 
  count(level_educ) %>%
  mutate("%" = n / sum(n) *100) %>%
  mutate_at(3, round, 2) %>%
  kable(caption = "Descriptive statistics of level education)", 
        align = "c") %>%  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"))
freq_depv
```

```{r}
level_educ1 <- prop.table(table(data01$educ_mom, data01$level_educ),2)*100

level_educ1 %>%

  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"))
```
